hero02.title: Bringing Argentinian Flavors to Your Local Farmer Market
hero02.subtitle: Fresh, authentic empanadas coming soon to a market near you!

about.title: Our Journey to the Farmer Market
about.content: At Kiki Empanadas, we believe in bringing the community together through the love of food. Our journey to local farmer markets is an exciting step towards sharing our passion for Argentinian cuisine with more food enthusiasts. Stay tuned for our launch dates!

cta.title: Be the First to Know
cta.subtitle: Sign up to receive exclusive updates and launch dates for our farmer market stalls.

subscribe.title: Subscribe for Farmer Market Updates
subscribe.description: Enter your email to stay updated on our farmer market presence and special offerings.

testimonials.feedback: Kiki's empanadas are a staple at our family gatherings. Can't wait to grab them at the farmer market!
testimonials.author: Jenna E.

testimonials.feedback: The best empanadas I've ever tasted! Looking forward to seeing Kiki Empanadas at my local market.
testimonials.author: Miguel D.
